name: Pupu Rush
description:
Pupu Rush!

Ever had that feeling that you should somehow be compensated when cleaning up after your dog? Well, here's the game for you!

Objective:

Poop your way to the top! Clear as many stages within 3 minutes. The higher the stage, the higher the Poopycoin yield.

How To Play:

You earn Poopycoins by simply cleaning after your dog, but! Any poop left unkept will deduct your earnings.

Clearing a stage gives you two options.

Proceed - Moves forward to the next stage and attempt to earn the next goal.

End Round - Play it safe and bank your earnings sending you back to the Loadout screen

Game Over:

When the 3-minute timer runs out in the middle of a stage. You lose ALL Poopycoins you gathered at the start of the round. :'(

Features:

Three playable dog breeds (More breeds soon!)

Upgrades and tools for poop cleaning efficiency

Petting System:

You can pet the dog once per round by tapping them, just make sure you're ready for a "Happy Dog"

Happy Dog = A dog that poops a-plenty for a period of time.

Petting your dog also makes them grow fond of you, which makes them potentially poop out a Golden Poop (2x Poopy Coin yield)

Pulot Combo:

Picking up poop in succession would build up the "Pulot Combo!". The timer would freeze for 5 seconds every multiple of 5, so keep that combo coming!

"Pulot" simply means "pick-up" in Tagalog (Filipino language), in case you were wondering :D

Join my Discord Server!

Have an idea or suggestion for Pupu Rush? Or brag about your highest stage clear? I'm all ears :D

https://discord.gg/mkMFw3SJzV
